title: Restore admin panel with passcode-protected product management interface

requirements.summary: Restore the admin panel interface displaying passcode-protected ItemForm and ItemList components
acceptanceCriteria: The admin interface displays the passcode entry field requiring '3415' before showing the add product form
After entering the correct passcode, the ItemForm component becomes visible with fields for name, description, price, and image upload
The ItemList component displays all existing products with delete buttons
The admin panel layout matches the previous implementation structure

file_operations.description: Verify that the AdminPage component correctly renders both the passcode-protected ItemForm component and the ItemList component. Ensure the passcode '3415' is required before the ItemForm becomes visible. The ItemForm should display fields for name, description, price, and image upload with progress tracking. The ItemList should display all products with delete functionality. Use the blob-storage component for image upload handling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure the admin panel remains accessible within the application's routing structure
acceptanceCriteria: The admin route exists and is navigable
Users can access the admin panel to manage products
The admin functionality works independently from the main checkout flow

file_operations.description: Verify that the admin route is properly configured in the TanStack Router setup and that it correctly renders the AdminPage component. Ensure the route is accessible and navigable within the application. Confirm that the Layout component wraps the admin route appropriately.
Add a navigation link to the admin panel in the Navigation component to make it easily accessible from other pages. Include an admin icon or text link that routes to the admin page.
